word_group.brief_definition: 极度担心, 担心得要命
担心邮政官员；忧虑的邮局官员

bilingual.target: 萨米尔叔叔会非常担心的。

bilingual.source: The doctor spoke reassuringly to the worried patient.
bilingual.target: 医生对担心的病人令人安心地说话。

bilingual.source: The doctor smiled sympathetically at the worried patient.
bilingual.target: 医生同情地对那位担心的病人微笑。

bilingual.source: The manager's words did little to reassure the worried employees.
bilingual.target: 经理的话对使担心的员工安心作用不大。

bilingual.source: I understood immediately what my parents were worried about.
bilingual.target: 我立刻明白了我父母担心的是什么。
泰勒：这就是我为什么担心的。

bilingual.source: This is what they were worried about.
bilingual.target: 这是他们所担心的事情。

bilingual.source: It's when they stop you need to be worried.
bilingual.target: 而当它们停下也就是你们需要担心的时候了。

list.abstract: worried，英 [ˈwʌrid]，美 [ˈwɜːrid]。英语单词，作形容词时，指的是担心的；不安的。作动词时，指的是不安；发愁。短语搭配为“be worried about（担心；担忧；发愁）”。例句为“I began to feel a little worried.（我开始有点担心了）”。 worried近义词为afraid。反义词为reassure。
歌曲《Worried》是泰国Come On Sweet公司制作的电影《Yes or No2》（想爱就爱2）的插曲，由泰国著名影视音乐制作人Jeab Wattana制作，并由泰国新生代女演员同时也是该剧女一号的“Aom Sushar Manaying（李海娜）”演唱。

yingyinNormal.en: Michael, I'm not worried about Gertrud. I'm worried about you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 米夏，我不担心格楚德。我担心的是你。

yingyinNormal.en: And your wife is worried about me?
yingyinNormal.zh: 而你妻子担心的人却是我？

yingyinNormal.en: I didn't really come along because I was worried Po would go hungry. I was worried about you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我来到这里，不是因为我担心阿宝会挨饿，我担心的是你。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm worried about the party. What this could do to the party.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我担心的是党派。这对党派的影响。

yingyinNormal.en: The dragon? That's what you're worried about? Not the people you almost killed?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你担心的是那只龙? 不是你差点害死的人?

yingyinNormal.en: Alex is gonna be fine. That's the one I'm worried about. I'm gonna go talk to her.
yingyinNormal.zh: 艾丽克斯没事，这位才是我所担心的，我要去跟她谈一谈。

yingyinNormal.en: It's not him I'm worried about, it's us, we were young. We didn't know any better. We will now.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他不是我担心的，而是我们，我们那时还年轻。我们什么都不知道。我们现在知道了。

yingyinNormal.en: I told you, I stopped drinking. No. It's not you I'm worried about. See? That's what we need, then. We just need a day to relax.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我说过，我戒酒了。我担心的可不是你。你看，那就更应该去了，我们需要放松一天。

yingyinNormal.en: What we're worried about is that we have created an environment in which you feel it's necessary to... embelli... fanta... exagger...
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们担心的是我们营造出来的这种氛围让你觉得有必要...修...虚...夸...

yingyinNormal.en: I'm the child she was worried about? I have a brother and sister whose combined intellectual wattage couldn't power a potato clock, if I spotted them the potato.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她最担心的孩子居然是我？我有一个哥哥和一个姐姐，那两个人的智商瓦数加起来都不够给玩具土豆钟供电，而且还得是我帮他们指出土豆在哪。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm just worried about our bills.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我只是担心我们的账单。

yingyinNormal.en: You know, what am I worried about?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我在瞎担心什么？

yingyinNormal.en: I'm worried about him. He looks terrible.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我很担心他，他脸色不好。

yingyinNormal.en: You're worried about the crowd we just saw.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你担心我们刚看到的那群人吗。

yingyinNormal.en: Sheldon, are you worried about your safety?
yingyinNormal.zh: 谢尔顿，你是在担心你的人身安全吗？

yingyinNormal.en: I just, I'm so worried about her. Come here.
yingyinNormal.zh: 只是...我很担心她。过来。

yingyinNormal.en: And I'm worried one's gonna hit me in the eye.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我还担心它会弹到我的眼睛上呢。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm just worried about her. That's all. I'm clean.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我只是担心她而已。我戒了。

yingyinNormal.en: The more I worried about, the more I couldn't sleep.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我越是担心，越是没有办法入睡。

yingyinNormal.en: All right, well, whatever. I wasn't worried. You weren't?
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，不管怎么说，我一点也不担心，是吗？

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

adj. 担心的；担忧的；不安的

word_family.mean: v. 不安；担心；发愁；操心；撕咬；啮碎；担心的；发愁的；使烦恼；使担心

examination_example.sentence: Many people who are opting to work in retirement because they are <highlight>worried</highlight> about making ends meet in their later years.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 许多人选择退休后工作，因为他们担心晚年会入不敷出。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

examination_example.sentence_trans: 嗨，南希，你看起来很担心。

examination_example.sentence: I'm <highlight>worried</highlight> I'll get nervous and freeze on stage.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我担心我会在舞台上紧张得僵住。

examination_example.sentence: As he was <highlight>worried</highlight> that it would be too warm, he laid it out on the table near an open window.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 由于担心太热，他把它放在一扇开着的窗户旁边的桌子上。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 担心的; 担忧的; 发愁的

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 不安；担心；发愁；撕咬；（worry的现在分词）
adv. 担心地; 焦虑地
adj. 担心的；担忧的；不安的

word_family.mean: v. 不安；担心；发愁；操心；撕咬；啮碎；担心的；发愁的；使烦恼；使担心

sense_info_list.zh: 担心的; 担忧的; 发愁的

examination_example.sentence: I began to feel a little <highlight>worried</highlight>.
Grayson Turner is a father of three girls and he isn't <highlight>worried</highlight> at all.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 格雷森·特纳是三个女孩的父亲，他一点也不担心。

examination_example.sentence: She was <highlight>worried</highlight> that my grandfather would be angry.
